targets.query:
from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "GPS")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "lat" or r._field == "lon")
|> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Dash Kill Switch")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BPS Trip")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Any System Failures")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Any System Shutoff")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Ignition")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BPS All Clear")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "BPS Contactor State")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Charging Enabled")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "WDog Triggered")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "CAN Error")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Voltage Data Array")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Temperature Data Array")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "5")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Current Data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "State of Charge Data")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Supplemental Voltage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Car State")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Array Contactor State Change")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "0")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Supplemental Voltage" or r["_measurement"] == "Motor Controller Bus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Current")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] ==  "Motor Controller Bus")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Voltage")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Velocity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "m/s")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Velocity")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rpm")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Supplemental Voltage" or r["_measurement"] == "Motor Controller Phase Current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "B")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Supplemental Voltage" or r["_measurement"] == "Motor Controller Phase Current")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "C")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Motor Voltage Vector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Real")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Motor Voltage Vector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Imaginary")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Real")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Motor Current Vector")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Imaginary")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Motor BackEMF")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Real")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Motor BackEMF")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Phase Peak")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Motor Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Phase C")

  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Motor Temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Internal")

from(bucket: "LHR")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Odometer & Bus Amp Hours")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Charge")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Charge Flow into Controller DC Bus
